name: Mechalike
description:
An entry for the FINAL BOSS Game Jam

Mechalike is a futuristic dystopian RPG game filled with story, action, and tough bosses! ...but your version of the game doesn't seem to have any of that. In fact, the only thing your version of the game has is the final battle. The game doesn't even let you progress upon defeating the final boss, it's just a constant loop. 

How many times can you beat the final boss before you end up defeated yourself?

---

I plan to update this once the competition is over. This is only a fraction of the original idea.

---
